code: import React,{useState}from'react';import LoginForm from'./LoginForm';import SignupForm from'./SignupForm';import'./AuthForm.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AuthForm=()=>{const[isLogin,setIsLogin]=useState(true);const handleSwitchToSignup=()=>{setIsLogin(false);};const handleSwitchToLogin=()=>{setIsLogin(true);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"auth-page",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"auth-card",children:isLogin?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LoginForm,{onSwitchToSignup:handleSwitchToSignup}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SignupForm,{onSwitchToLogin:handleSwitchToLogin})})});};export default AuthForm;
